body: I'm following Chris' tutorial 17 on customizing energyplus construction, and use the demo gh file he provided. [https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OWeoXlQyPxg&index=18&list=P...](https://www.youtube.com/watch?v=OWeoXlQyPxg&index=18&list=PLruLh1AdY-SgW4uDtNSMLeiUmA8YXEHT_) I tried to create a new EP construction with the demo file, but the newly imported EPConstruction component shows a warning message asking for Honeybee update. (image 1) I use the updateHoneybee component accordingly (image 2) . But the warning is still there and I can't get the correct EPConstruciton output. May I ask if I missed anything here? Thanks! [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Wib7New*846dGA1sAEAUQDeZQRGy53lIS9LnPSxyFTli0NlHj3x4uT39BzL8pIducE4gnwJkOaV*qR2mH9XeHIz4xNFHuh3l/01.PNG) [](http://api.ning.com:80/files/Wib7New*845V1fLVpFJkJzOGieueh4sShQbrAGfEAArdsOGT7*d3IwtcVjGTradbQajG2Mlptvjqyzow-P6rKsOioM6xlafq/02.PNG)
topic: "EP Construction" component asking for Honeybee update
